title: WATCH: Serena uses her hubby as a wig stand
text:
More relationship goals served up by Serena Williams and Alexis Ohanian.

Serena Williams and hubby, Alexis Ohanian, are quite possibly at the top of the relationship goals in celebville. Alexis has proven to be a romantic, knight-in-shining-armour, from jetting his tennis guru wife to Italy for a snack, to taking 16 weeks paternity leave to be with Serena and their daughter, Olympia.

Alexis has proven his undying love for his wife in the big and little things of life. He recently again set husband goals, when he sat on a chair and posed as Serena’s wig stand while she cleaned and brushed her wigs.

Serena posted a series of videos on her IG stories, showing her followers how she takes care of her wigs. In the video reposted by a fan on Twitter, Serena had just washed her wigs and was brushing them – while they sit on her husband’s head!

She also jokes about how her wig stand can’t really keep still.
description: More relationship goals served up by Serena Williams and Alexis Ohanian.
